title: Smart Data Models - ITinfrastructure / ServiceComponent
description: Component (packaged software, for instance, a container) of a service deployed in the Cloud-Edge-IoT continuum, which runs on top of an InfrastructureElement.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be ServiceComponent

infrastructureElement.description: Relationship. InfrastructureElement in which the component has been deployed.

service.description: Relationship. Service to which the component belongs.

serviceComponentStatus.description: Property. Current status of the component. Enum:'Failed', 'Finished', 'Locating', 'Migrating', 'Removing', 'Running', 'Starting'

infrastructureElementRequirements.description: Relationship. Requirements of infrastructure (e.g. RAM, CPU, ...) that are needed for running the component.

containerImage.description: Property. Container image used for the component, it must point to a valid image stored in a container registry (e.g. Docker Hub or GitHub/Gitlab container registry).

cliArgs.description: Property. Command line arguments (in key-value format) that are needed to run the component.

envVars.description: Property. Environment variables (in key-value format) that are needed to run the component.

networkPorts.description: Relationship. Network ports that are used by the component.

persistentStorage.description: Relationship. Requirements of persistent storage that are needed for running the component.

isJob.description: Property. Defines if the component is deployed as a job: a one-off task that runs to completion and then stops.

overlayNetworkIP.description: Property. IP address assigned to the component in the network overlay that connects all the components of the same service.

currentCpuUsage.description: Property. Units:'CPU cores'. Current CPU usage of the component.

currentMemoryUsage.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. Current memory usage of the component.
